hasDitaContent.@value: Zidovudine increases the risk of haematological toxicity when given with nabumetone. Manufacturer makes no recommendation.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Zidovudine   increases   the risk of haematological toxicity when given with   nabumetone .  Manufacturer makes no recommendation .

hasDitaContent.@value: Both nabumetone and zoledronic acid can increase the risk of nephrotoxicity.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  nabumetone  and  zoledronic acid  can increase the risk of nephrotoxicity.
